experience.description: Conducted quantitative research on stochastic modeling for long-term care insurance, analyzing the impact of interest rate volatility on reserve sufficiency using R and Monte Carlo simulations.
Developed a multivariate regression model to analyze socio-economic determinants of mortality rates in the Pacific Northwest, providing statistical evidence for localized mortality table adjustments.

experience.role: Research Assistant - Predictive Modeling in P&C
experience.description: Supported faculty in modeling catastrophic risk for property and casualty insurance, utilizing historical climate data to refine frequency-severity distributions for flood-related claims.
